name: Moonlight Hills
description:
Welcome to Moonlight Hills, where there is always a new mystery. Take control of Simon and Emma, two siblings who now have strange powers and can take on the creatures of the night.

CONTROLS==============================

ENTER | pause menu

  • SIMON

ARROWS LEFT AND RIGHT | move

ARROW UP | jump

NUM PAD 1 | use item

NUM PAD 2 | change item

  • EMMA

A and D | move

W | jump

E | use item

Q | change item

(ok so this is a bit awkward but the game is COOP only. Which mean you either have to find someone to play with, or control the two characters with both hands)

OST by Noel Fernandes | https://www.youtube.com/user/Emanuelvocal
